sentence.Network_en: A Chinese speech recognition method based on character - based N - gram model is proposed in this thesis.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late 18th cent.: from French gramme, from late Latin gramma 'a small weight', from Greek
early 18th cent.: from Portuguese grão, from Latin granum 'grain'

entry.def: A gram is a unit of weight. One thousand grams are equal to one kilogram.

means.word_mean: 1. a metric unit of weight equal to one thousandth of a kilogram
